entry.content:
等我写完~ {% highlight ruby %} def print_hi(name) puts “Hi, #{name}” end print_hi(‘Tom’) #=> prints ‘Hi, Tom’ to STDOUT. {% endhighlight %}

entry.summary: 等我写完~def print_hi(name) puts "Hi, #{name}"endprint_hi('Tom')#=> prints 'Hi, Tom' to STDOUT.
